title: Looking For Convenience? Well, Look No Further!
posting_body: ['The St James Apartments is located in the heart of Downtown Tacoma, St. James Apartments is just a short walk to fine dining, nightlife, and museums.', 'St James’ is just minutes from the historic Wright Park.', 'Don’t miss out on this wonderful location, get in touch with our community office today!', 'Utilities are additional, charged separately.', 'For more information or to schedule a tour, please call our office', 'show contact info', '.', 'You can apply online at: <URL>', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday: 9am-5pm', 'Saturday-Sunday: CLOSED', 'Apartment Home Features:', '*Spacious Floor Plans', '*Refrigerator', '*Stove', '*Spacious Closet', 'Amenities:', '*Easy access to I-5.', '*Pet Friendly.', '*Secured Entry', '*On-site Laundry', '*Beautiful Scenic Views of Puget Sound.', 'QUALIFICATIONS:', '**Must have 2.85 times rent in gross monthly income', '**Must have NO evictions in past 7 years', '**Must NOT owe any money to any apartments/rental companies', '**Must NOT have an open bankruptcy', '**Collections/past due balances must not be over $3,000(excluding medical/student loans)', 'Visit our website for this and many other great properties at: <URL>/', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
